module.module_id AS moduleId,module.parent_id AS parentId,module.parent_ids AS parentIds,module.module_name AS moduleName,module.module_code AS moduleCode,module.module_path AS modulePath,module.http_method AS httpMethod,module.module_status AS moduleStatus,module.type,module.sort,module.create_by AS createBy,module.create_date AS createDate,module.update_by AS updateBy,module.update_date AS updateDate,module.del_flag AS delFlag,module.remark
mapper.select:
SELECT ,role.role_key as roleKey FROM sys_role role INNER JOIN sys_role_power rp on role.role_id = rp.role_id INNER JOIN sys_power power on rp.pow_id= power.pow_id INNER JOIN sys_power_module pm on power.pow_id = pm.pow_id INNER JOIN sys_module_resources module on pm.module_id = module.module_id where role.del_flag = 0 and role.role_key in ( SELECT DISTINCT role.role_key AS roleKey FROM sys_user_info user INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur on user.user_id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN sys_role role on ur.role_id = role.role_id WHERE role.del_flag = 0 and role.role_status = '0' and user.user_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT DISTINCT role.role_key AS roleKey FROM sys_user_group ug INNER JOIN sys_user_group_role ugr on ug.user_group_id = ugr.user_group_id INNER JOIN sys_role role on ugr.role_id = role.role_id WHERE role.del_flag = 0 and role.role_status = '0' and ug.user_group_id in ( SELECT DISTINCT gr.user_group_id AS userGroupId FROM sys_user_info user INNER JOIN sys_user_info_group uig ON user.user_id = uig.user_id INNER JOIN sys_user_group gr ON uig.user_group_id = gr.user_group_id WHERE gr.del_flag = 0 and user.user_id = #{userId} )
) ORDER BY module.sort
